name: Vacuum (Crimid)
description:
Game made in 48 hours for the GMTK jam.

Blast monsters in an arcade style fast-paced Shoot-em-up set in deep space.
Intended to run on windows

Kidvade-Lead programmer.

Crimid-Artist and Aux. programmer.

Game Uses the A* Pathfinding project under the asset-store free license.

https://unity3d.com/legal/as_terms
